languages.text: "Тебе нужно возвращаться в мир из чертогов смерти. Прошу..." {n}Кибелла прижимает ладонь к вашей груди.{/n} "Все откровения, что открыл тебе обретенный свет — сбереги в сердце. Это — только твое сокровище".

traits.locale_text: "Тебе нужно возвращаться в обыденный мир из чертогов смерти. Прошу..." {n}Кибелла прижимает ладонь к вашей груди.{/n} "Все откровения, что открыл тебе Кан'Шин — сбереги в сердце своем. Это — твое, и только твое сокровище".

languages.text: "You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that the ritual has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."
languages.original_text: "Тебе нужно возвращаться в мир из чертогов смерти. Прошу..." {n}Кибелла прижимает ладонь к вашей груди.{/n} "Все откровения, что открыл тебе обретенный свет — сбереги в сердце. Это — только твое сокровище".

traits.locale_text: "You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that Kan'shin has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."

"You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that Kan'shin has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."

"You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that Kan'shin has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."

"You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that the ritual has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."

"You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that the ritual has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."

languages.text: "Ihr müsst aus den Hallen des Todes zurück in die Welt treten. Und bitte ..." {n}Sie legt eine Hand auf deine Brust.{/n} "Alles, was das Ritual Euch offenbart hat ... behaltet es in Eurem Herzen. Das ist allein Euer Schatz."
languages.original_text: "You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that the ritual has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst aus den Hallen des Todes zurück in die Welt treten. Und bitte ..." {n}Er legt eine Hand auf deine Brust.{/n} "Alles, was das Ritual Euch offenbart hat ... behaltet es in Eurem Herzen. Das ist allein Euer Schatz."

languages.text: «Debe volver de los salones de la muerte a su mundo. Y, por favor...». {n}Kibellah lleva una mano a tu pecho.{/n} «Guarde en su corazón todo lo que el ritual le ha revelado. Es su tesoro y solo le pertenece a usted».
languages.original_text: "You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that the ritual has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."

traits.locale_text: «Debe volver de los salones de la muerte a su mundo. Y, por favor...». {n}Kibellah lleva una mano a tu pecho.{/n} «Guarde en su corazón todo lo que el ritual le ha revelado. Es su tesoro y solo le pertenece a usted».

languages.text: 「死の広間から世界へと戻る必要があるわ。それから、どうか…」{n}キベラはあなたの胸に手を押し当てる。{/n}「儀式があなたに示したすべては…胸にしまっておいて。それはあなただけの宝よ」
languages.original_text: "You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that the ritual has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."

traits.locale_text: 「死の広間から世界へと戻る必要があるわ。それから、どうか…」{n}キベラはあなたの胸に手を押し当てる。{/n}「儀式があなたに示したすべては…胸にしまっておいて。それはあなただけの宝よ」

languages.text: “如今，你必须从死亡的殿堂重新回到现世。而且，请记住……”{n}绮贝菈将一只手按在你的胸前。{/n}“寻光祭礼向你展示的一切，都务必要牢记在心。这是只属于你的财富。”
languages.original_text: "You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that the ritual has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."

traits.locale_text: “如今，你必须从死亡的殿堂重新回到现世。而且，请记住……”{n}绮贝菈将一只手按在你的胸前。{/n}“寻光祭礼向你展示的一切，都务必要牢记在心。这是只属于你的财富。”

languages.text: « Vous devez quitter les couloirs de la mort et retourner dans votre monde. Par ailleurs... » {n}Elle pose une main sur votre poitrine.{/n} « Tout ce que le rituel vous a révélé... Gardez-le pour vous. Cela ne concerne personne d'autre que vous. »
languages.original_text: "You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that the ritual has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez quitter les couloirs de la mort et retourner dans votre monde. Par ailleurs... » {n}Elle pose une main sur votre poitrine.{/n} « Tout ce que le rituel vous a révélé... Gardez-le pour vous. Cela ne concerne personne d'autre que vous. »

languages.text: "Ölümün salonlarından dünyaya geri dönmelisin. Ayrıca lütfen..." {n}Kibellah, elini göğsüne bastırıyor.{/n} "Ayinin sana gösterdiği her şeyi yüreğinin derinliklerinde sakla. Bu, yalnızca sana ait bir hazine."
languages.original_text: "You must return from death's halls out into the world. And please..." {n}Kibellah presses a hand to your chest.{/n} "All that the ritual has revealed to you — keep it in your heart. It is your treasure alone."
